altTitles.ja: ヘルク

description.en:
The Demon King has been defeated, and now the Demon World is running a contest to choose his successor.   
A muscular and high-level human named Helck has joined and says that he wants to destroy all HUMANS. Is he serious?  
Red Vamirio, one of the Four Heavenly Kings of the whole Demon Empire, is monitoring the contest and can't believe this. What's the secret behind Helck and the human world?
description.pt: Helck é o herói que derrotou um dos reis demônio. Quando um rei demônio morre, um novo deve ser declarado. Isso é feito através de um torneio de artes marciais, onde o mais forte se torna o novo governante. Vamiro, um dos Grandes Reis Demônios, descobre que Helck é um dos participantes do torneio e tem ganhado todas as lutas! Qual poderia ser o motivo? Se um humano se torna o próximo rei demônio, o que isso significa para o reino demoníaco?

altTitles.ja: 隣の席の地味なやつ

altTitles.ja-ro: Tonari no Seki no Jimi na Yatsu

altTitles.ja: となりのせきのじみなやつ

description.en:
Kawase Sonoe ain't much to look at. Plain, serious and uninteresting, sure, but for some reason, her next-seat neighbor Mori Ichika can't stop staring at her.

Mori follows her and discovers that Kawase has an awful lot to show her, and that she'll receive from Kawase an education that she can't admit she needed.

altTitles.en: Zatch Bell! 2

description.en:
The sequel to Konjiki no Gash!!, aka Zatch Bell.

Once the battle to decide the king of the demon world, in which 100 demon children fought against each other, had come to an end… the king of the demon world was crowned, and the demon world lived out the rest of its days in peace.

Or at least, that was how it was supposed to be.

Now, a shocking fact about the current state of the demon world comes to light. And in the depths of their despair, three demon children decide to risk it all for one last chance at survival.
description.it: Dopo la battaglia per decidere il re del mondo dei demoni, in cui 100 bambini demoni si sono combattuti tra loro... Fu deciso il re del mondo dei demoni e arrivarono giorni di pace... o almeno così si supponeva! Fatti scioccanti vengono rivelati sull'attuale mondo dei demoni. Al limite della disperazione, tre bambini demone fanno una scommessa!
description.pt-br: Uma vez terminada a batalha para decidir o Rei do mundo demoníaco, na qual 100 mamodos lutaram uns contra os outros… o Rei do mundo demoníaco foi coroado, e o mundo demoníaco viveu o resto de seus dias em paz.

title.en: Kimi no Risou no Maid ni Naru!

altTitles.ja: キミの理想のメイドになる！

altTitles.en: To Become Your Ideal Maid!

description.en:
To return her master's kindness, her goal is to become the ideal maid.

A classic romantic comedy of love with perfect sugar content begins!

A few months into his high school life, Renya Nijou has no friends or girlfriend and spends his days living alone. But one day, he witnesses how Maya Kamishiro, the most beautiful girl in his class, was about to be kidnapped by mysterious men dressed in black, apparently Maya was sold by her parents to pay their debts, so Renya decides to help her with the financial resources he got through investments, but Maya can't help but want to return the favor, and declares that she will become Renya's maid...?
description.ja:
ご主人様への恩を返すため、理想のメイドを目指します♥
糖度満点王道メイドラブコメ！

高校生活が始まって数ヶ月、二条廉也は友人も彼女もおらず、
さらに一人暮らしという孤独な日々を送っていた。
だがある日、クラス一の美少女、神城真夜が謎の黒服の男たちに
連れ去られそうになっているところを目撃する。
真夜は借金の片に両親に売られそうになっていたのだ。
そんな彼女を廉也は投資などで築いた財力を元手に助けるのだが、
恩を返さずにはいられない真夜は廉也のメイドになることを宣言し……！？

description.en: When your company goes bankrupt and your marriage is on the rocks, what’s a guy to do? Move to Tokyo to become an adult film star, of course! This diary-style comedy explores the pitfalls of an everyman who tries to break into the world of porno because it seems like a pleasurable way to restart his life. He soon learns that it’s a harder job than he bargained for!

description.en: “Whom will you go out with?” Those were the words Doumoto Genki was confronted with on his first day of high school.  Now he has to figure out which one of the “out of this world” beauties he wants to date!
description.ja: 体が丈夫なことが取り柄である主人公・弦貴。高校に入学することを機に、新たな出会いに胸を膨らませていたところ、突然2人の美少女・カリンと聖から告白される！ そんな彼女たちの目的は彼とドッキングすることだった…!! ドッキングとは一体何か。ドッキングで何ができるのか。そして彼女たちは何者なのか…!?
description.pt-br: **”Com quem você vai sair?”** Essas foram as palavras com as quais Doumoto Genki foi confrontado no seu primeiro dia na escola secundária. Agora ele tem que descobrir qual das belezas “de outro mundo” ele quer namorar!

altTitles.en: The Real Daughter Has Returned
The Real Daughter Is Back

description.en:
Helga Eutrid, a half-blood noble born from a filthy maid of the Duke’s family, was a substitute daughter–a fake. She worked hard to become a real daughter, and continued to work harder still.

"Duchess! The real lady is alive."
"Her name is… Helianne!”

Helga prayed to God and begged that the real daughter didn’t return to take her place.

"...return, Helianne."
"Please don't return, I beg you."

Helga wondered, was it because she was a fake that her pleas did not reach God?

“Dear God, I have prayed to you countless times, haven’t I? I implore you; do not let her return." She shouted these prayers again and again until her throat turned hoarse; but it was in vain.

'The child who will ruin my whole world…
The Duke family’s real daughter, Helianne.'

The real daughter has returned.

---

Helga Yttri, a half-noble lady who inherited the blood of a lowly maid. 

A bastard child whose position was switched by the Duke's maid; a Fake child.

Helga gave her everything to be recognised as the real daughter. 

"Your Grace! The real Young Miss is alive."
"She goes by the name Hyllian...!" 

Helga prayed to God countless times so that the real Young Miss never returned. 

" ...don't come back, Hyllian."
"Don't come back, please." 

She wondered if her prayers failed to reach God because she was a fake daughter. 

"Dear God, I've been praying countless times." 
"I asked you never to let 'that child' return."

The prayers she howled until her throat went hoarse were all in vain. 

"The real daughter of the House of Yttri, Hyllian... The child who will destroy my whole world." 

The real daughter is back.

description.en: Ruan Tao, who originally wanted to dominate the entertainment world, encounters her malicious stepmother at the very beginning of her career. However, the stepmother is a great actress who dominates the world of entertainment with an iron fist. Ruan Tao can only submit and at the same time think about how to overthrow the evil stepmother's reactionary forces!As a result, she is arranged to participate in a romance reality show with her stepmother, but who is to tell her that it isn't a young love reality show with men and women courting each other? What is the plot when the stepmother holds her hand and asks with concern, fearing that she will hurt herself?
description.zh: 明艳腹黑大影后小妈x骄纵任性小辣椒女儿 原本想要称霸娱乐圈的阮桃一出道就撞上了自己黑心的后妈，奈何后妈是在娱乐圈只手遮天的大影后，阮桃只能夹着尾巴做人，顺便想着怎么才能打倒恶毒后妈的反动势力！结果就被安排和后妈一起参加恋综，可是谁来告诉她，不是男女嘉宾卿卿我我的青春恋爱综艺吗?后妈拉着她的手嘘寒问暖生怕她磕着碰着是什么剧情?

description.en: The high school boy Eiyuu has a problem! His two childhood friends (♀) who go to the same school as him, Shio and Akari, are too cute! Even though they have no interest in him, he looks at their grown-up selves with sexual interest. If they were to find out… it would be utterly embarrassing! Meanwhile, his two childhood friends also have secrets of their own...!? It's irritating! It's complicated!! But childhood friends are the best!!! A sweet and irritating love triangle romcom ♡ where you can't be honest!
description.ja: 高校生男子・えーゆーの悩み。それは、二人の幼馴染「しお」と「あかり」が可愛すぎること! 向こうにその気はないのに、俺だけがオトナになった二人をエッチな目で見てるなんてバレたら…ハズすぎる! 一方、実は二人もえーゆーのことが…!? ヒロイン全員、幼馴染!! じれったい! ややこしい!! けど幼馴染って超最高っ!!!
description.th: เอยู (A.U.) หนุ่มมอปลายที่กำลังพบปัญหาใหญ่! ปัญหานั่นก็คือเพื่อนสมัยเด็กทั้งสองคน "ชิโอ" และ "อาการิ" ที่อยู่โรงเรียนเดียวกันนั้นน่ารักเกินต้าน! ถ้าหากทั้งสองรู้ว่าเขาได้มองพวกเธอที่เติบโตขึ้นมาอย่างสมส่วนด้วยสายตาลามก (ถึงแม้จะไม่ได้ตั้งใจ) ล่ะก็มีหวังแย่แน่! ในทางกลับกัน เพื่อนสมัยเด็กทั้งสองคนนั้นเองก็มีความลับของตนเอง...!? ทั้งหยอกเย้า! ทั้งทำให้สับสน!! ถึงจะอย่างนั้นเพื่อนสมัยเด็กนี่แหละยอดที่สุด!!! เลิฟคอมเมดี้รักสามเส้าแสนหวานที่พูดตรง ๆ ไม่ได้♡

description.en:
A highly educated and wealthy elite who suffers from Haphephobia(fear of touching or of being touched) is forced by his grampa to work in the countryside for a few months if he wants to inherit the company. There he meets an ordinary, kind-hearted man.  
When the hot headed cat met the cheeky dog … what kind of sparks will it burst out?

title.en: My Home As a Filming Location!

description.en:
After returning from walking around my neighborhood, I was met with an entire film crew in my front yard?!
Yeonwoo, a beekeeper who lived in a secluded village, signed a contract that stated that his house would be used for filming with a PD who directed <Countryside Occupations> while he was drunk.
Later on, he found out that he would be filming his life with Kang Dojoon, a famous Korean actor.
Begrudgingly, he started to prepare for filming.
Contrary to what he thought before, he changed his mind after seeing Kang Dojoon in person.

*If I have to live with a handsome guy like that for 10 days... that wouldn't be so bad.*

Will Dojoon successfully complete filming for <Countryside Occupations>?
We just broke up but we live together? Coming Soon April 27th.

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

description.en:
Mimori Touka has always been something of a background character in his high school. So when he and his classmates are summoned to a fantasy land and gifted with incredible skills, it seems like the perfect opportunity to make a name for himself.

The only problem? Mimori’s skills are abysmal at best, and he’s banished to a deadly dungeon. 

But as he begins to test these new abilities, he discovers just how powerful he’s become. Can Mimori fight his way back to exact revenge?!
description.pt:
Durante a viagem escolar Touka e seus colegas são convocados para outro mundo. No entanto, Touka foi o único com a classificação mais baixa: Rank-E - um status extremamente baixo em comparação com seus colegas de classe. Assim, o personagem secundário e herói abandonado, se tornara o mais forte à medida que avança e contra-ataca.

description.en:
Rust worked in the alchemist association. He specialized in basic research, but the current president, a former government official, failed to understand the importance of the basic research department and slashed its budget. To make matters worse, he was made to transmute basic materials for alchemists of other departments.

But one day, his budget for the next term was reduced to zero, and the president announced the basic research department was disbanded.

The same day, a friend from his academy days invited him to help develop her new dominion in the borderland, and Rust, seeing no future for himself in the association, decided to quit.

Rust was actually one of the greatest alchemists on the planet. The basic materials he transmuted were of the highest quality, and could not be acquired anywhere else. These high quality materials covered a lot of gaps in the association, and Rust’s departure made a big mess.

Feeling liberated after leaving the association, Rust worked in the borderland with a newfound enthusiasm and vigor.

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

description.en:
The so-called “Lighthouse of the North,” the prosperous trading town of Schoarra, hides a dark underbelly: seedy slums ruled by five ruthless crime bosses.

When streetwise orphan Vlad finds the brothel he works for decimated by a disgraced knight, he turns to the path of the blade, pledging himself to the pursuit of power by sword. 

Blessed with the ability to seek wisdom from his sentient sword, Vlad embarks upon a journey of growth and peril as swordsman in service to the powerful House Vayezid.
description.fr: Vlad est un jeune vagabond du bidonville de Shoara qui admire les chevaliers depuis toujours. Sa vie bascule le jour où une voix commence à résonner dans sa tête après avoir été frappé par un éclair noir, et où le chevalier de la lune bleue apparaît soudainement devant lui.
description.id: Vlad, seorang gelandangan dari daerah kumuh yang ingin menjadi seorang ksatria. Hinggai suatu hari dia tersambar petir hitam... Dan semenjak itu dia dapat mendengar suara seseorang di kepalanya setiap kali ia memegang sesuatu yang berupa pedang!
description.th: 'วลาด' เด็กหนุ่มผู้ยากจนข้นแค้นและไร้อภิสิทธิ์ซึ่งใด ๆ เขามีความชื่นชมในตัวของอัศวินเป็นอย่างมาก และในวันนี้ชีวิตข้างถนนของเขากำลังจะเปลี่ยนไป เมื่อเขาเริ่มได้ยินเสียงของใครบางคนและอัศวินแห่งคณิกาได้ทำลายโลกของเขาจนหมดสิ้น… "แม้จะไม่ใช่ท้องฟ้ายามค่ำคืนและอยู่ไกลเกินกว่าใครจะมองเห็น ขอเพียงแค่มีความตั้งใจที่จะส่องแสง ยังไงก็ต้องได้เป็นดวงดารา"
description.zh:
心怀星梦的流浪汉
逆袭成为剑术大师
梦想成为骑士的贫民窟小流浪汉布拉德，遭遇黑色的晴天霹雳后，便开始能听到某个声音，这个声音和从天而降的神秘骑士彻底颠覆了他的生活…他能如愿走出后巷，成为梦想中的骑士吗？
description.zh-hk: 那把像星星的劍，對生於貧民區的弗拉德而言，曾經十分遙遠。然而僅僅一夜，那道藍月般的劍影就將弗拉德的生活破壞殆盡。 「既然如此，那我便授予你，我的劍技。」弗拉德體內有個聲音對他說。為了復仇，如今少年緊握著手中的星，正式步上成為劍士之路。

title.en: A Dance of Swords in the Night

altTitles.en: In the Night Consumed by Blades, I Walk
Sword Fanatic Wanders Through the Night

altTitles.es-la: Camino en la noche consumido por las espadas

altTitles.ja: 刀に酔った夜を歩く

description.en:
The Mystic Lunar Dance Troupe took in Jin Sohan as an orphan, and he spent his childhood with them. But one day, one of the four great demons, the Venom Demon, discovered that he was special and kidnapped him. After all kinds of tests, he decided to raise him as his disciple. Ten years later, Jin Sohan tried to look for traces of the Mystic Lunar Dance Troupe, but the Sword Dance Troupe had already been destroyed at the hands of the Unorthodox Faction that’s now ruling over his hometown.

---
Kidnapped as a child to be trained in the art of poison, Sohan Jin returns to his hometown in search of the group of New Moon Sword Dancers who raised him. However, upon his return, Sohan discovers the sword dancers have been defeated by a nefarious sect that now rules the area, with some members having been abducted. What would have been a heartwarming reunion transforms into a quest for revenge as Sohan begins his search for the remaining sword dancers, and he’s willing to poison anyone who gets in his way.

---
**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5612093), [Volumes](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5612161)

description.ja:
天涯孤独だった陳蘇霞は、玄月剣舞団に拾われ、そこで子ども時代を過ごす。 しかしある日、彼の特殊な身体能力に気づいた四大悪人の一人、毒魔に連れさられ様々な人体実験のモルモットになる。 その後、毒魔の弟子となった陳蘇霞は、10年後…玄月剣舞団の行方を捜そうとしたが、剣舞団はすでに故郷を制圧していた黒道たちによって壊滅されていて…

description.ko:
진소한은 본디 고아 출신이었으나, 
현월검무단이 거두어 그녀들과 어린 시절을 함께 보낸다.  
하지만 어느 날 그의 특수한 신체 특성을 알아본 사대악인 중 하나인 독마에게 납치당하고, 
온갖 실험 끝에 결국 제자로까지 키워지게 된다. 
10년 뒤, 그는 현월검무단의 흔적을 찾아보려 하지만, 
검무단은 이미 고향을 지배하는 흑도들의 손에 사라져 버렸는데!

---

description.zh:
《狂魔重生》编剧新作！
恶人之徒出山惩治黑道！
陈少寒原本是孤儿出身，但被弦月剑舞班收留，在弦月剑舞班度过了美好的童年。可是有一天，四大恶人之一毒魔将陈少寒绑架，并将其培养成了弟子。十年后，陈少寒回到故乡，试图寻找弦月剑舞班的痕迹，但剑舞班早已消失在了黑道手中!

altTitles.ja: 夜桜さんちの大作戦

altTitles.vi: Nhiệm vụ tối thượng nhà Yozakura

altTitles.es-la: La Misión de la Familia Yozakura

description.en:
Taiyo Asano is a super shy high school student and the only person he can talk to is his childhood friend, Mutsumi Yozakura. It turns out that Mutsumi is the daughter of the ultimate spy family! Even worse, Mutsumi is being harassed by her overprotective, nightmare of a brother, Kyoichiro. What drastic steps will Taiyo have to take to save Mutsumi?! A spy family comedy - the mission begins!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Mission: Yozakura Family** (2023)
- [English volumes (Viz Media)](https://www.viz.com/mission-yozakura-family)
description.es: Taiyo Asano es un estudiante de secundaria súper tímido y la única persona con la que puede hablar es su amiga de la infancia, Mutsumi Yozakura. ¡Resulta que Mutsumi es la hija de una última familia de espías! Peor aún, Mutsumi está siendo acosada por su sobreprotector hermano, Kyoichiro. ¿Qué decisión tendrá que tomar Taiyo para salvar a Mutsumi? Una comedia familiar de espías: ¡Comienza la misión!
description.fr:
Afin de protéger Mutsumi et de découvrir la véritable raison de la mort de ses parents, Taiyo Asano va devoir devenir membre de la famille Yozakura, une famille d’espions de haut vol ! Parviendra-t-il à survivre à ce quotidien plein de dangers pour, cette fois, réussir à protéger ceux qui lui sont chers ?

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.it:
:||Tradotto da [Isekai Italy Scan](https://linktr.ee/isitscan/) e [Bullet Club](https://mangadex.org/group/8588/bullet-club)   
  
Taiyo Asano è un timidissimo studente delle superiori e l'unica persona a cui può parlare è la sua amica d'infanzia, Mutsumi Yozakura. Si scopre che Mutsumi è la figlia della suprema famiglia di spie! Ancora peggio, Mustumi viene tormentata dal suo fratello iperprotettivo, Kyoichiro. Quale tragico destino Taiyo dovrà affrontare per salvare Mustumi?! Una commedia su una famiglia di spie - la missione avrà inizio!||
description.es-la: Taiyo Asano es un estudiante de secundaria súper tímido y la única persona con la que puede hablar es su amiga de la infancia, Mutsumi Yozakura. ¡Resulta que Mutsumi es la hija de una última familia de espías! Peor aún, Mutsumi está siendo acosada por su sobreprotector hermano, Kyoichiro. ¿Qué decisión tendrá que tomar Taiyo para salvar a Mutsumi? Una comedia familiar de espías: ¡Comienza la misión!
description.pt-br: Taiyo Asano é um estudante super tímido do ensino médio e a única pessoa com quem ele consegue conversar é sua amiga de infância, Mutsumi Yozakura. Acontece que Mutsumi é a filha da melhor família de espiões! Pior ainda, Mutsumi está sendo assediada por seu super-protetor, o pesadelo de um irmão, Kyoichiro. Que passos drásticos Taiyo terá que tomar para salvar Mutsumi? Uma comédia familiar de espiões – a missão começa!

description.en: The daily life of Lee Jae, a hot-blooded police officer in a quiet rural village, is turned upside down by the reunion with his first love.Who would have thought that his first love, who had suddenly disappeared without a word one day, would reappear before him as a gangster?"Just bear with it a little longer. I'm going to do everything that I've been putting off today."Can he resist that dirty handsome face that he never wanted to see again?

title.en: Traveling Through Time and Space to Become an Unlucky NPC: I Have a Wife to Protect Me

altTitles.zh: 穿越成倒霉NPC: 我有老婆罩着

description.en: He Qingyang traveled to the game "Sword Immortal Legend" he was playing and became an unlucky NPC who kept skipping the plot when he was playing the game. This NPC kept harassing the main heroine Ning Yiwan, and later his identity was exposed and he was killed by Ning Yiwan.....

altTitles.en: Dear Summer Sky

description.ar: بايك قيهو الذي يحب السماء أكثر من الناس، لذا كل ما تلتقطه كاميراته هو السماء. في أحد أيام الصيف، تنتقل فتاة تدعى "هانيول" والذي يعني اسمها "سماء" إلى صف قيهو لتجلس بجانبه.
description.en: Baek Gihu, who loves the sky more than people, takes pictures of the sky with his camera. One summer day, a girl named "Haneul"—her name means "Sky"—transfers to his class and sits in the seat next to him.

A boy was locked in a basement and trained his entire life. His deranged father, the one who confined him, declared, 


“The Apocalypse is coming.” 

Now, armed with the training and survival skills he had honed over years of practice, he must survive the impending apocalypse.
description.pt-br:
Um garoto foi trancado em um bunker e foi treinado a vida inteira. Seu pai perturbado, aquele que o confinou, declarou: 

“O Apocalipse está chegando”.

Agora, armado com o treinamento e as habilidades de sobrevivência que ele havia aprimorado ao longo de anos de prática, ele deve sobreviver ao apocalipse iminente.

title.en: Seeking a Beauty in the East Sea

altTitles.en: Searching for the Beauty in the East China Sea

altTitles.vi: Đến Đông Hải Tìm Mỹ Nhân

description.en:
In a past life, the mountain deity took in a quiet child, only to find her care fostering an unexpected twist: the little one didn't want to be a servant but instead aspired to be the deity's most intimate companion! But fate played its cruel hand, turning the once inseparable pair into bitter enemies.

In this life, an adorable, water-fearing mermaid happens upon an aloof beauty with no memories of her past. A chance kiss during their first meeting sets off a chaotic companionship. However, what seemed to be a serendipitous meeting turns out to be a reunion of a relationship already rich with deep-seated emotions...

From lifetimes past to the present, love flourishes...

altTitles.en: Absolute Submission
Bully Conquest

description.en: Jin Daim, who was being bullied by delinquents, encounters a game on his old phone that changes his life. A fraudulent strategic RPG game where you can boss around the delinquents and recruit benevolent helpers to grow stronger! The ultimate goal of this RPG game is to eliminate school violence from the world.

title.en: Apparently, Disillusioned Adventurers Will Save the World

altTitles.ja-ro: Ningen Fushin no Boukenshatachi ga Sekai o Sukuu Youdesu

altTitles.en: It Seems Skeptical Adventurers Will Save the World

altTitles.id: Petualang Yang Tidak Percaya Pada Manusia Akan Menyelamatkan Dunia

altTitles.zh: 不相信人类的冒险者们好像要去拯救世界

altTitles.zh-hk: 不相信人類的冒險者們好像要去拯救世界

altTitles.ja: 人間不信の冒険者たちが世界を救うようです

altTitles.en: Adventurers Who Don't Believe in Humanity Will Save the World

altTitles.ja-ro: Ningen Fushin no Boukensha-tachi ga Sekai wo Sukuu you desu

description.en: Life isn’t going well for veteran adventurer Nick. Despite his loyalty to his party, he was betrayed by a teammate who accused him of embezzlement, then kicked out by his mentor. On top of that, his girlfriend dumped him too! Tired, heartbroken, and looking for a drink, Nick chances upon a few kindred spirits who are as jaded as he is. Can these disillusioned heroes put their faith in each other long enough to save the world together…?
description.pt-br: A história de quatro aventureiros, todos que experimentaram traição e dificuldades, unindo-se em um "que se foda" a sociedade.

altTitles.en: Chained Soldier

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Hell Soldiers
Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.ja: 魔都精兵のスレイブ

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

description.en:
"Never forgive me."
Margret, who was brutally murdered by her lover, is reborn 7 years later as 'Meg'. Will 'Meg', who doesn't know anything about the world, be able to acclimate well into her new life...? A story uncovering the truth behind her death and the growing love between the characters!
description.fr:
Terriblement assassinée par son amant, Margaret renaît sous le nom de Mag sept ans plus tard et vit une nouvelle vie.

Mag, qui ne connaissait pas le monde, pourra-t-elle s'adapter à sa nouvelle vie ?
description.ko:
"저를 용서하지 마세요."
 
사랑하는 연인에게 끔찍하게 살해당한 마가렛은
7년 후 '매그'로써 다시 태어나 새로운 삶을 살아간다.
 
세상 물정 모르던 '매그'는 새로운 삶을 잘 적응해 나갈 수 있을까...?
그녀의 죽음에 얽힌 진상과 인물들의 성장 러브 스토리!

title.en: Oni Ure Idol ga Kyou mo Watashi wo Oshitekuru (Pre-Serialization)

altTitles.ja: 鬼売れアイドルが今日も私を推してくる

altTitles.en: The Superstar Idol Crushes on Me Today Too

description.en:
Enatsu Sayuki. An unsuccessful idol with a one-sided rivalry with the ever so popular Sera. 
Touma Sera. A superstar idol, perfect in every way, who will take every chance to shower Sayuki with love. 

A fun girls-love comedy capturing the chaotic and heartwarming moments of their daily lives!

-----

Series of shorts posted on Ookami's twitter.
**Info about the serialization can be found [[here](https://x.com/thinking_man000/status/1804074781358125330)]**

altTitles.ja: 烏は主を選ばない

altTitles.en: The Raven Does Not Choose Its Master

description.en:
Yamauchi - a fantastic world where the Yatagarasu, a race of three-legged crows with the ability to transform into humans, live. Yukiya, a young Yatagarasu, is appointed as the personal attendant of the eccentric Crown Prince Wakamiya. Soon, he is entangled in a web of conspiracies attempting to overthrow the heir to the Imperial throne. 

An adaptation of the second book of the award-winning <Yatagarasu> novel series by Chisato Abe. The first book has been licensed in English as [A Raven for All Seasons](https://mangadex.org/title/c22db5fc-726a-41ad-8402-5537e7de2277/karasu-ni-hitoe-wa-niawanai) by [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10162/episode/336576).
description.ja:
シリーズ累計150万部超！ 大人気小説「八咫烏（やたがらす）シリーズ」比翼の漫画化！
「山内（やまうち）」と呼ばれる異世界で、人の姿に転身できる「八咫烏」達が織りなす物語。日嗣の御子の座についた若宮に一年の期限付きで仕えることになった少年、雪哉。だが若宮は「うつけ」と呼ばれるとんでもない人で…。圧倒的スケールの世界観と緻密な筆致でおくる異世界ファンタジー！

description.en: Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.
description.fr: La vie de Na Hae-soo se désintègre lorsque son mari la trahit en ayant une liaison, la laissant accablée de dettes et perdant leur enfant. Dans un coup dévastateur, elle le surprend avec une femme plus jeune. Brisée et désespérée, Na Hae-soo sent sa vie s'effondrer autour d'elle. Cependant, un jeune homme mystérieux entre soudainement dans sa vie, lui demandant de lui enseigner l'amour adulte. Sa vulnérabilité et sa sincérité commencent à éveiller des émotions en Na Hae-soo, l'incitant à reconsidérer son chemin vers l'avenir.
description.id: Kehidupan Na Haesoo berubah ketika suaminya mengkhianatinya dengan berselingkuh, membuatnya terlilit hutang dan kehilangan anak mereka. Setelah itu, ia mendapati suaminya bersama seorang wanita yang lebih muda. Dengan perasaan hancur dan putus asa, Na Haesoo merasa kehidupannya di sekelilingnya runtuh dan hancur. Namun, seorang pemuda misterius tiba-tiba memasuki hidupnya, Beom Taeha, yang meminta untuk diajari tentang cinta orang dewasa. Keluguan dan ketulusannya mulai mengusik emosi dalam diri Na Haesoo, dan menantangnya untuk mempertimbangkan kembali langkah apa yang akan diambil.

description.en:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

altTitles.en: I Am Going to Be a Bastard
I Want to Be a Scoundrel
I'm Going to Be a Great Villain
The Wicked Want to Rescue
I Want to Be a Big Baddie

description.en:
A proper villain must be ruthless and evil, a bringer of death! Having tormented the protagonist to his heart's content, he makes a brilliant exit. Once he's finished his work, he goes out with a bang.
Wang Yi was determined to be that kind of villain. Unfortunately… His male lead can read minds. (:з)∠*)
“You mongrel!” Mr. Yi chuckled as he looked down on the novel’s male lead.
Suddenly, a thought bubble filled with cute emojis (⁄ ⁄ ⁄ω⁄ ⁄ ⁄) and the words “You’re so cute…” appeared in front of Qin.
Qin: ?

“Those wearing armor shall never take off their arms, will never die, and will live in pain.”

With a witch’s curse, the ‘Cursed Knights’ began to roam the world.

And Enoch, a boy who encounters one, is about to discover what happens to him.

altTitles.ja: ライター

description.en:
From Garo 1982-07.  
During the summer last year, before I started my current job, I worked a physical labor job along with some old people.

altTitles.ja: Tomo Chan ha Onnanoko!

altTitles.en: Tomo-chan is a Girl!

altTitles.ja: トモちゃんは女の子!

description.en: Tomo Aizawa was able to successfully confess to her crush Junichirou Kubota. There is only one problem: He just sees her as his buddy. He thought that she was a boy until they went to middle school together, because her grade school was in a different school district.

altTitles.ja: あらがえ！ダークエルフちゃん

altTitles.en: Resist! Dark Elf-chan

description.en: A dark elf who was rampaging on the continent was defeated by the stoic swordsman Crow. She was prepared to die, but for some reason, Crow suddenly decided to bring her home and look after her... ?!
description.ja: <完結済み>大陸で猛威を振るっていたダークエルフ。しかし冷徹な剣士・クロウに討伐されてしまいそうに。覚悟を決めるがなぜか突然クロウにお持ち帰り宣言をされ、手厚いおもてなしを受けることになって…!?
description.pt-br: Uma elfa escura que estava assolando o continente foi derrotada pelo estoico espadachim Crow. Ela estava preparada para morrer, mas por alguma razão, Crow de repente decidiu trazê-la para casa e cuidar dela...?!

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

altTitles.en: Please Bully Me, Miss Villainess!

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

altTitles.ja: くま クマ 熊 ベアー

description.en: Yuna, a 15-year-old girl, started playing the world's first VRMMO. She has earned billions of yen in stocks and confines herself in her house playing the game without going to school. Today, a major update has arrived and she obtained a non-transferable rare bear outfit. But the equipment is so embarrassing that she can't wear it even in the game. Furthermore, when she answers the survey regarding the new update and relaunches the game, she appears in an unknown forest in the bear outfit. Where is this? Email from God? A different world? If she wears the bear outfit she's a cheat, if she takes it off she's a normal girl. Her adventure starts just like that. Yuna began doing whatever she wanted.
description.ru:
Пятнадцатилетняя девочка Юна уже три года ведет жизнь хиккикомори. Друзей, школу и даже родителей ей заменяют Интернет и онлайн-игры. Год назад она начала играть в игру «Fantasy World Online» — RPG с виртуальной реальностью. Она заработала миллиарды и с помощью денег избавилась от присутствия родителей.  
  
И вот, вышло новое глобальное обновление. Как игрок с большим стажем, она по акции получила уникальный костюм. Затем прошла опрос и вместо игры оказалась в глухом лесу. Письмо от Бога? Другой мир? Что за бред?  
  
В своем новом костюме она читер. Без него обычная девочка. Так началось ее приключение, в котором она решила делать то, что ей захочется.

title.en: The Kind Older Sister Is No More

altTitles.en: There’s No Good Sister
No More Nice Sis

description.en:
Irene has always been living in the shadow of her ill and frail sister, Riel. She believed that she could and had to do everything for her family… until Riel stole everything from her.

After realizing that there is no place for her in her home, and that she was never loved by her family, Irene decides to do her utmost to become independent, and in doing so, crosses paths with Noel Kristen, a man who has been subjected to a much similar fate…

“We may be able to save each other.”

description.en: A vampire who has been sleeping for nearly two hundred years, Maria is awakened by a passing werewolf girl by a chance, and the moment the coffin is opened, the curse falls on the werewolf girl. The two girls set foot on the journey to the city
description.es-la: Maria, una vampiro que había estado durmiendo por casi doscientos años, es despertada por Xing Lan, una chica lobo que pasaba por ahí. Cuando el ataúd se abre, una maldición cae sobre Xing Lan. Sin embargo, en lugar de asustarse, la inocente Xing Lan cree haber encontrado una excelente compañera, y ambas embarcan juntas un viaje a la ciudad. Así comienza su historia.
